data.title: Stratovarius – Skin Back Alley
data.meta_description: Posts about Stratovarius written by skinbackalley
data.text:
Stratovarius have released a lyric video for their new track “Shine In The Dark.”

The song is lifted from the band’s new studio album, Eternal, scheduled for release in Europe on the 11th of September, and in the USA on the 18th of September, via earMusic. It will be the Finnish rock groups 15th studio LP.

Says Keyboardist Jens Johansson: “Now we’re all tanned and rested and it’s about fucking time to get back into the saddle.

“Everybody has been busy the last few months writing lots of new songs – and only the best has been recorded for Eternal.”

The band will be heading out on the road to support the album’s release. Check out the video for “Shine In The Dark” below.

The full track list for Eternal is:

01. “My Eternal Dream”

02. “Shine In The Dark”

03. “Rise Above It”

04. “Lost Without A Trace”

05. “Feeding The Fire”

06. “In My Line Of Work”

07. “Man In The Mirror”

08. “Few Are Those”

09. “Fire In Your Eyes”

10. “Lost Saga”
